alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 11:42AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River at GA 5 near Woodstock affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little River at GA 5 near Woodstock. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage at Old Georgia Highway 5. A public boat ramp just downstream and on the right bank from the bridge will be under one foot of water. Low lying areas of the South Cherokee Recreation Park and the soccer fields off Druw Cameron Drive will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 11 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
